fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Visit one person. If they are visited, a ghost will appear in front of the visitor, blocking all visits on them.  They are also shocked, notifying them that they've been roleblocked by a ghost.
-Shock one person, dealing a powerful attack to them. If they somehow live, they are notified who you are.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If somebody calls you out on who you are, you are modkilled.
-All visits on you will fail, and you canâ€™t be lynched.
-If somebody calls you on on who you are, and they are wrong, they are modkilled.
-When this role is killed, they will show as a random town role not in game.
- all players are informed ghost lady is in play at the start of the game
